title: How did Thomas Edison invent more than 1,000 things?
description:
How did a home-schooled kid become the greatest inventor of all time? To this day no one holds more invention patents than Thomas Edison!  Find out and inspire your kids on today's fun-filled episode of Who Smarted? And please like & follow us on Facebook for more ... www.facebook.com/WhoSmarted
www.whosmarted.com
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
